snippet.title: TCG World In-Game Builder Trailer - Create Your Dream Home In The Metaverse
snippet.description:
Become a TCG Master Builder! With TCG World's in-game builder players will be able to create their dream virtual home in the metaverse. Select from thousands of different building items to create a unique experience on your virtual land. Mint it as an NFT to use it as your home or list it for sale on our marketplace to get paid for your creation.

TCG World is an online open world virtual gaming experience where players can earn TCG Coin 2.0, gather NFT collectibles, own virtual real estate, create, explore the game world, control their own online businesses, or just have fun. TCG World introduces a new approach to NFTs making it more than just a piece of art — now players can take their NFTs into the gaming world and play. Everything a player owns in the metaverse is an NFT — real estate, vehicles, pets, trophies and even player avatars.

Website: https://tcg.world/
Official Telegram: https://t.me/TCGGaming
Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/OfficialTCGCoin
Official FB: https://www.facebook.com/TCGCoinOfficial
Official Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/TCGWorldOff...
Medium: https://medium.com/@TCG_World
